mainInfo.description: Teslovel offers electric bike rentals in Dnipro – for commuting, leisure, and delivery services. We provide electric bikes for rent by the day, by the week, or on custom terms depending on your needs. A wide range of electric bike models to suit different preferences and requirements. Affordable, transparent rental conditions under contract. Convenient contact options and a high level of service.

contactsMenu.title: Contacts
contactsMenu.additionalPlaceholder: e.g., preferred time, type of bike, etc.
contactsMenu.successAlert: Contact form submitted! We'll reach out soon.

faq.q: What do I need to rent an electric bike?
faq.a: You need to present a passport, foreign passport, or driver's license. A formal rental agreement and handover act are also signed, outlining usage rules, liability, and return conditions. This ensures transparency and safety for both parties.
Yes, a deposit of 500 UAH per electric bike is required. It is refunded at the end of the rental if there is no damage.

faq.q: What is the minimum age for renting a bike?
faq.a: Only individuals aged 18 and above can rent an electric bike.

faq.q: What support service do you offer?
faq.a: We provide technical support, quick contact via phone, messengers, or social media, and fast response in case of breakdowns or other issues.

faq.q: What features do your electric bikes have?
faq.a: Our bikes are equipped with powerful 500W hub motors, high-capacity batteries, PAS systems, quality disc brakes, puncture-resistant tires, and displays with indicators for a comfortable and safe ride.
You can rent a bike from 1 day up to the entire season. The rental season is valid when the temperature is between +5°C and +40°C.

faq.q: Can I test the bike before renting?
faq.a: Yes, we offer a free test ride for up to 30 minutes after deposit payment so you can assess the comfort and quality.

faq.q: Do you plan to sell bikes?
faq.a: Yes, in the future, there will be an option to purchase an electric bike with warranty service.

faq.q: What are the advantages of an e-bike over other transport?
faq.a: It’s fast, eco-friendly, convenient, and cheap. You save time, avoid traffic, and enjoy your ride. They’re great for deliveries and daily commuting.
We are the only service of this kind in the city, offering full support, maintenance, a personal approach, and unique long-range batteries.
Reach out via Instagram, fill out the form on our website, or call the provided number. We’ll call you back during the day.
